title: How to publish my book and sell it on Amazon? What are some online publishing press where a book can be published - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are looking at an online publishing platform, then Kindle Direct Publishing Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing , LULU, GoodReads, iBooks, Google Books Google Play Books Partner Center Google Play Books Partner Center, and more. In an online publishing platform you will have to look into all aspects before publishing. I.e. proofreading, editing, book cover designing and then submit it for publishing. You can also explore the offline self-publishing platforms. Here, a nominal sum is charged at every major step, like editing, proofreading, book cover design and related services. In the end when your book starts selling they pay you 100% of the commission on the sales. You can reach out to my team at http://betagramgroup.com a self-publishing house I co-founded, to know more about it. Reaching out to me is just a suggestion, do explore all the possible methods of publishing. And go with the best as per your convenience. Have a Great Day!
You need to have paperbook ready to sell on amazon. Also, you can sell, ebook via kindle. There are many publishing services available which can help. If your manuscript is ready we can help you to.
